description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Fish Cakes with Yoghurt Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoked Fish Cakes with Yoghurt Sauce
name: Smoked Fish Cakes with Yoghurt Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make sauce, half cucumber lengthways and scoop out seeds. Roughly chop and place into a bowl. Add lemon juice and yoghurt. Season to taste. Serve fish cakes with yoghurt sauce and lemon.
